sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; const Article = (props) => { const [posts, setAllPosts] = useState(); const [post, setPost] = useState(); const [loaded, setLoaded] = useState(false); let params = useParams(); console.log(params); useEffect(() => { fetch(`/blog/articles.json`, { method: "GET" }) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((json) => { setAllPosts(json); setLoaded(true); }) .catch((e) => console.log(`An error occured: ${e}`)); if (loaded) { posts.map((data) => { if (data.heading === params.heading) { setPost(data); } return true; }); } }, [loaded]); console.log(posts); console.log(post); console.log(loaded); return (
{post.tag}

{post.heading}

{post.date}

{post.intro}

Subheading
